Package Assignment

Interface Payment

All Known Implementing Classes:
Reservation, RoomService
public interface Payment
Interface for generating the total bill for a particular guest's hotel stay when the guest checks out, which return the guest's total room charges and RoomService orders, inclusive of taxes and discounts.
Author:
joel, jinrui, jamie, tan yu
